original_text:
With my mouth I will give great thanks to the Lord;
    I will praise him in the midst of the throng.
korean_text: 내가 입으로 여호와께 크게 감사하며 많은 사람 중에서 찬송하리니

sentences.original_text: With my mouth I will give great thanks to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 내 입으로 주께 크게 감사를 드리겠습니다

sentences.original_text: I will praise him in the midst of the throng.
